name: Welcome to the Food Chain...
description:
A 30 second two player versus arcade game in which the players try to avoid being eaten by the shark by eating speed-boosting shrimp.

Thomas Lu - Programming, Sound & Ideas

Kylie Moses - Art & Ideas

Elliott Mahler - Programming & Ideas

George Li - Programming & Ideas

Christina Orcutt - Title Screen & Ideas

Chao Chen- Ideas

James Earl Cox III - Ideas

Bryan Pickens - Ideas

Julian Ceipek - Ideas

Special thanks to Sean Bouchard.
